filter.description: all or a comma-separated list of: addAttachmentToCard, addChecklistToCard, addMemberToBoard, addMemberToCard, addMemberToOrganization, addToOrganizationBoard, commentCard, convertToCardFromCheckItem, copyBoard, copyCard, copyCommentCard, createBoard, createCard, createList, createOrganization, deleteAttachmentFromCard, deleteBoardInvitation, deleteCard, deleteOrganizationInvitation, disablePowerUp, emailCard, enablePowerUp, makeAdminOfBoard, makeNormalMemberOfBoard, makeNormalMemberOfOrganization, makeObserverOfBoard, memberJoinedTrello, moveCardFromBoard, moveCardToBoard, moveListFromBoard, moveListToBoard, removeChecklistFromCard, removeFromOrganizationBoard, removeMemberFromCard, unconfirmedBoardInvitation, unconfirmedOrganizationInvitation, updateBoard, updateCard, updateCard:closed, updateCard:desc, updateCard:idList, updateCard:name, updateCheckItemStateOnCard, updateChecklist, updateList, updateList:closed, updateList:name, updateMember or updateOrganization

fields.description: all or a comma-separated list of: data, date, idMemberCreator or type

format.description: One of: count, list or minimal

page.description: Page * limit must be less than 1000

idModels.description: Only return actions related to these model ids

member_fields.description: all or a comma-separated list of: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url or username
